segments.text: This kitchen looks clean except for that sink disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman focused on the plate, but water is pouring out disgustingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing everywhere, soaking the cabinets like a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, gross, she should feel that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies, sticky hands all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilting, cookies might scatter on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy grabbing from the jar, crumbs falling already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, probably drooling for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dish towel bunched up, who knows if it's clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down, ruining the pretty wood doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden is tidy, but inside it's a soggy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet left on, such careless filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes near the spill, everything will get ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR
